main event: A civilian observed a bowling pin-shaped object in Florence, Oregon, in 1964.
interesting points: The object was white or silver in color and estimated to be 12-15 ft in length., The witness claimed the object was flying at an estimated speed of 600-900 mph., The sighting lasted for 1-2 minutes before the object disappeared in a straight southerly direction., Atmospheric conditions were clear with no wind at the time of the sighting., The civilian observer, a 55-year-old night foreman, reported having no sound or trail from the object.
witness description: Mr. [REDACTED], age 55, resident of Florence, Oregon, night foreman at the U.S. Plywood.
